verses.verse: שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear זֹ֣את <WH2063> O בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> ye this O house יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> of Jacob הַנִּקְרָאִים֙ <WH7121> which are called בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> by the name יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִמֵּ֥י <WH4325> out of the waters יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah יָצָ֑אוּ <WH3318> and are come forth הַֽנִּשְׁבָּעִ֣ים ׀ <WH7650> which swear בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> by the name יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּבֵאלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel יַזְכִּ֔ירוּ <WH2142> and make mention לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor בֶאֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> [but] not in truth וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor בִצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> nor in righteousness

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מֵעִ֤יר <WH5892> city הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> themselves of the holy נִקְרָ֔אוּ <WH7121> For they call וְעַל־ <WH5921> on אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> themselves upon the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel נִסְמָ֑כוּ <WH5564> and stay יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name ס

הָרִֽאשֹׁנוֹת֙ <WH7223> the former things מֵאָ֣ז <WH227> from the beginning הִגַּ֔דְתִּי <WH5046> I have declared וּמִפִּ֥י <WH6310> out of my mouth יָצְא֖וּ <WH3318> and they went forth וְאַשְׁמִיעֵ֑ם <WH8085> and I shewed פִּתְאֹ֥ם <WH6597> [them] suddenly עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> them I did וַתָּבֹֽאנָה׃ <WH935> and they came to pass

מִדַּעְתִּ֕י <WH1847> Because I knew כִּ֥י <WH3588> that קָשֶׁ֖ה <WH7186> that thou [art] obstinate אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you וְגִ֤יד <WH1517> sinew בַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> [is] an iron עָרְפֶּ֔ךָ <WH6203> and thy neck וּמִצְחֲךָ֖ <WH4696> and thy brow נְחוּשָֽׁה׃ <WH5154> brass

וָאַגִּ֤יד <WH5046> declared לְךָ֙ מֵאָ֔ז <WH227> I have even from the beginning בְּטֶ֥רֶם <WH2962> Before תָּב֖וֹא <WH935> [it] to thee before it came to pass הִשְׁמַעְתִּ֑יךָ <WH8085> I shewed פֶּן־ <WH6435> not תֹּאמַר֙ <WH559> [it] thee lest thou shouldest say עָצְבִּ֣י <WH6091> idol עָשָׂ֔ם <WH6213> hath done וּפִסְלִ֥י <WH6459> them and my graven image וְנִסְכִּ֖י <WH5262> and my molten image צִוָּֽם׃ <WH6680> hath commanded

שָׁמַ֤עְתָּֽ <WH8085> Thou hast heard חֲזֵה֙ <WH2372> see כֻּלָּ֔הּ <WH3605> all וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not תַגִּ֑ידוּ <WH5046> all this and will not ye declare הִשְׁמַעְתִּ֤יךָ <WH8085> [it]? I have shewed חֲדָשׁוֹת֙ <WH2319> thee new things מֵעַ֔תָּה <WH6258> from this time וּנְצֻר֖וֹת <WH5341> even hidden things וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not יְדַעְתָּֽם׃ <WH3045> and thou didst not know

עַתָּ֤ה <WH6258> now נִבְרְאוּ֙ <WH1254> They are created וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not מֵאָ֔ז <WH227> for וְלִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> now and not from the beginning even before י֖וֹם <WH3117> the day וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> have not שְׁמַעְתָּ֑ם <WH8085> when thou heardest פֶּן־ <WH6435> you will not תֹּאמַ֖ר <WH559> them not lest thou shouldest say הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold יְדַעְתִּֽין׃ <WH3045> Behold I knew

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Even לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שָׁמַ֗עְתָּ <WH8085> Yea thou heardest גַּ֚ם <WH1571> Even לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> not yea thou knewest גַּ֕ם <WH1571> Even מֵאָ֖ז <WH227> for לֹא־ <WH3808> has not פִתְּחָ֣ה <WH6605> was not opened אָזְנֶ֑ךָ <WH241> not yea from that time [that] thine ear כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH3045> for I knew בָּג֣וֹד <WH901> treacherous תִּבְגּ֔וֹד <WH898> that thou wouldest deal very וּפֹשֵׁ֥עַ <WH6586> a transgressor מִבֶּ֖טֶן <WH990> from the womb קֹ֥רָא <WH7121> and wast called לָֽךְ׃

לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> the sake שְׁמִי֙ <WH8034> For my name's אַאֲרִ֣יךְ <WH748> sake will I defer אַפִּ֔י <WH639> mine anger וּתְהִלָּתִ֖י <WH8416> and for my praise אֶחֱטָם־ <WH2413> will I refrain לָ֑ךְ לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> not הַכְרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3772> for thee that I cut thee not off

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold צְרַפְתִּ֖יךָ <WH6884> Behold I have refined וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> as בְכָ֑סֶף <WH3701> thee but not with silver בְּחַרְתִּ֖יךָ <WH977> I have chosen בְּכ֥וּר <WH3564> thee in the furnace עֹֽנִי׃ <WH6040> of affliction

לְמַעֲנִ֧י <WH4616> sake לְמַעֲנִ֛י <WH4616> sake אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> For mine own sake [even] for mine own sake will I do כִּ֣י <WH3588> For אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> how יֵחָ֑ל <WH2490> [it] for how should [my name] be polluted וּכְבוֹדִ֖י <WH3519> my glory לְאַחֵ֥ר <WH312> unto another לֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אֶתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> ? and I will not give ס

שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> Hearken אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> unto me O Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and Israel מְקֹרָאִ֑י <WH7121> my called אֲנִי־ <WH589> I הוּא֙ <WH1931> he אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am רִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> I [am] he I [am] the first אַ֖ף <WH637> I am also אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <WH314> I also [am] the last

אַף־ <WH637> Surely יָדִי֙ <WH3027> Mine hand יָ֣סְדָה <WH3245> also hath laid the foundation אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וִֽימִינִ֖י <WH3225> and my right hand טִפְּחָ֣ה <WH2946> hath spanned שָׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> the heavens קֹרֵ֥א <WH7121> [when] I call אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> to יַעַמְד֥וּ <WH5975> unto them they stand up יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together

הִקָּבְצ֤וּ <WH6908> All ye assemble כֻלְּכֶם֙ <WH3605> all וּֽשֲׁמָ֔עוּ <WH8085> yourselves and hear מִ֥י <WH4310> Who בָהֶ֖ם הִגִּ֣יד <WH5046> which among them hath declared אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֲהֵב֔וֹ <WH157> hath loved יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> him he will do חֶפְצוֹ֙ <WH2656> his pleasure בְּבָבֶ֔ל <WH894> on Babylon וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <WH2220> and his arm כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <WH3778> [shall be on] the Chaldeans

אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> I [even] I have spoken אַף־ <WH637> indeed קְרָאתִ֑יו <WH7121> yea I have called הֲבִיאֹתִ֖יו <WH935> him I have brought וְהִצְלִ֥יחַ <WH6743> prosperous דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH1870> him and he shall make his way

קִרְב֧וּ <WH7126> Come אֵלַ֣י <WH413> to me שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> unto me hear זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise לֹ֤א <WH3808> From מֵרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> from the beginning בַּסֵּ֣תֶר <WH5643> in secret דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> ye this I have not spoken מֵעֵ֥ת <WH6256> from the time הֱיוֹתָ֖הּ <WH1961> took שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> was there אָ֑נִי <WH589> I וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> and now אֲדֹנָ֧י <WH136> that it was there [am] I and now the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <WH3069> GOD שְׁלָחַ֖נִי <WH7971> hath sent וְרוּחֽוֹ׃ <WH7307> and his Spirit פ

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֧ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD גֹּאַלְךָ֖ <WH1350> thy Redeemer קְד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God מְלַמֶּדְךָ֣ <WH3925> which teacheth לְהוֹעִ֔יל <WH3276> thee to profit מַדְרִֽיכֲךָ֖ <WH1869> which leadeth בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> thee by the way תֵּלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> go

ל֥וּא <WH3863> O that הִקְשַׁ֖בְתָּ <WH7181> thou hadst hearkened לְמִצְוֹתָ֑י <WH4687> to my commandments וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> have been כַנָּהָר֙ <WH5104> been as a river שְׁלוֹמֶ֔ךָ <WH7965> then had thy peace וְצִדְקָתְךָ֖ <WH6666> and thy righteousness כְּגַלֵּ֥י <WH1530> as the waves הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> have been כַחוֹל֙ <WH2344> also had been as the sand זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <WH2233> Thy seed וְצֶאֱצָאֵ֥י <WH6631> and the offspring מֵעֶ֖יךָ <WH4578> of thy bowels כִּמְעֹתָ֑יו <WH4579> like the gravel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> never יִכָּרֵ֧ת <WH3772> should not have been cut off וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> never יִשָּׁמֵ֛ד <WH8045> nor destroyed שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> thereof his name מִלְּפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> from before

צְא֣וּ <WH3318> Go ye forth מִבָּבֶל֮ <WH894> of Babylon בִּרְח֣וּ <WH1272> flee מִכַּשְׂדִּים֒ <WH3778> ye from the Chaldeans בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> with a voice רִנָּ֗ה <WH7440> of singing הַגִּ֤ידוּ <WH5046> declare הַשְׁמִ֙יעוּ֙ <WH8085> ye tell זֹ֔את <WH2063> likewise הוֹצִיא֖וּהָ <WH3318> this utter עַד־ <WH5704> out קְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> it [even] to the end הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אִמְר֕וּ <WH559> say גָּאַ֥ל <WH1350> hath redeemed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> ye The LORD עַבְדּ֥וֹ <WH5650> his servant יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> Jacob

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not צָמְא֗וּ <WH6770> And they thirsted בָּחֳרָבוֹת֙ <WH2723> them through the deserts הֽוֹלִיכָ֔ם <WH1980> led מַ֥יִם <WH4325> he caused the waters מִצּ֖וּר <WH6697> out of the rock הִזִּ֣יל <WH5140> to flow לָ֑מוֹ וַיִּ֨בְקַע־ <WH1234> for them he clave צ֔וּר <WH6697> the rock וַיָּזֻ֖בוּ <WH2100> gushed out מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> also and the waters
אֵ֣ין <WH369> There שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> [There is] no peace אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לָרְשָׁעִֽים׃ <WH7563> unto the wicked ס
